Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{3: 'This is the bow window, the only spot in Babylonia where you can see the distant home planet in its entirety.'}
{3: 'Hassen often sat here alone when there were no annoying meetings.'}
{3: 'Metallic debris, devoid of luster, floats quietly around Earth.'}
{3: 'They once represented human ambition, glory, and power...'}
{3: 'But in the face of that unprecedented defeat, these tools, along with pride, shattered into pieces.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Another decade has passed.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hassen still remembers the few decades that birthed such brilliance. The deep space probes, cold fusion engines, terraforming plans, Starship Fleet...'}
{3: 'But after the outbreak of the Punishing Virus, such glorious times never occurred again.'}
{3: 'How can humanity have the strength to plan its next steps now that the future is uncertain?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'President, the meeting is about to begin.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Hmm... Let me see the agenda for this quick meeting.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Aside from some routine reports...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica opens the tablet and highlights two items.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'The two main focuses are whether to expand the search and rescue range for the Gray Raven Commandant and... the border conflict with the Forsaken.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'These two can be merged as one, as the area controlled by the Forsaken is now a blind spot for our search and rescue.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Alright, let's go.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Clean Zone is a breather for humanity, but crises always arrive without notice.'}
{3: "Gray Raven Commandant disappeared and we lost contact with Watanabe. Then there's the strange movements of the Forsaken... So many unresolved matters weigh on his shoulders."}
{3: 'Hassen takes one last look at the distant home planet. Hidden among the silent wreckage are dormant ballistic missiles.'}
{3: 'The old weapons seem to remind him that beneath the calm, danger still lurks.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory827.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Reload, cover me!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A soldier retreats and is quickly replaced by another.'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: "I'm out of ammo. Anyone got some?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A fully loaded magazine is tossed over.'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: "That's also my last one.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The gunfire has become sporadic. Of the original 12-man assault team, only 4 remain.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Corrupted in front of them are crawling from every corner out like pests.'}
{3: 'After the final few shots, an empty magazine clicks sound simultaneously.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'All units, tighten the defense line. Prepare for melee combat!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The remaining soldiers immediately retreat to the command area.'}
{3: 'They form a semicircle so that Nithart, who is wearing a protective suit, is at the center.'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Captain, how is she?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Not good, but she's alive.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Nithart has fallen unconscious at some point and blood is seeping from the seams of her protective suit. If the terminal wasn't showing a heartbeat, Watanabe would have thought she was dead."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'These researchers may look fragile...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After plunging his tactical knife into the integrated chip in front of him, the soldier kicks away another Corrupted that tried to attack Nithart.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'But they never miss a beat when it comes to missions.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier B', 3: "Yeah, so it's our turn now. We must hold on until the rescue team arrives.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: "It doesn't look good. There are probably Corrupted along the way. It'll take time for the rescue team to break through.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: "Shouldn't you be saying something more encouraging now? Why are you being pessimistic?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'I meant for you to talk less and do more!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{3: 'A Corrupted nearby is sliced in half by a curved blade, and a military boot crushes its head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ballard, where are the reinforcements?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We've taken a heavy blow. We can't hold on much longer.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The only response is the harsh noises of the communication channel.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Damn it, is the communication malfunctioning again?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier C', 3: 'Did you hear something?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Soldier B', 3: 'Is the ground shaking too?', 4: '2'}
{3: "It wasn't until Watanabe ended the communication that he noticed the harsh sound wasn't just coming from his headset."}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: "It's getting closer! It might be a large Corrupted!", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.6', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'A beam of light pierces the dark underground space like a flash of lightning in the dead of night.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Are you trying to blind the people inside with your high beams?'}
{3: "A harsh scolding can barely be heard from the driver's seat."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg', 3: '0.6', 4: '0', 5: '1'}
{3: 'The roaring engineering vehicle charges into the Corrupted like a bull, crushing and grinding down the troublesome machines.'}
{3: 'The red tide is split in two, and the ship that broke through the waves stops steadily in front of Watanabe and the others.'}
{3: 'The rear hatch opens and fully armed soldiers jump out. They start to clear the remaining Corrupted.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Sorry for the wait. It took us some time to get this big guy running.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Thanks for opening the safety doors along the way that allowed it to come in.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His gaze sweeps over the remaining team members before resting on Nithart lying on the ground.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Medical team, save her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'You all should head to the rear cabin and report the situation.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ballard', 3: 'You said erroneous commands were sent to the Space Force?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Did she say what exactly?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'She only had time to tell me this much.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Looks like we'll have to wait until she wakes up to figure it out.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Worried about your father?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Without hesitation, the young man nods.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'I heard from Backhaus that you scored a perfect score in simulated flight training?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I did.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Nithart's in very bad condition. Even the doctor doesn't know when she'll wake up.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He speaks slowly, as if trying to convince himself while talking to Watanabe.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "According to what you said, sending out erroneous commands shouldn't happen as easily as blowing a fuse.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Private Watanabe, listen to orders!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'This mission is an extension of the Gestalt rescue operation. Currently, you are the only one in the team who can pilot a ship in space without additional equipment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'So, as the leader of this operation, I order you to pilot the space-air transport craft to space and confirm the situation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Make sure to find out exactly what erroneous commands were sent.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Ballard, if you continue on like this...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing his hesitation, Ballard raises an eyebrow instead.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Can you complete the mission?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Then go ahead, and leave this to me.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: 'Spaceport', 2: 'Orbital Altitude: 10,000 kilometers'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'Before the meeting starts, allow me to introduce someone.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the conference room, commandants from various starships sit on both sides of the table.'}
{3: 'This is their monthly report meeting, a rare chance for them to leave their starships.'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'I\'m sure you\'ve all heard of him. "Beak of Islay", the World Government\'s ace pilot...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'At this, the commandants on both sides of the table begin to murmur. Islay is where the World Government trains its pilots and tests new aircraft.'}
{3: 'Dozens of ace pilots come from there, but only one can be called "Beak of Islay".'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Cyril, please come in.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'I told you, no need to mention those titles.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "I'm here simply because I'm needed.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Years of battle have taken their toll on him. His body is deteriorating, and though he is the same age as Shin, his face is already covered in wrinkles.'}
{3: 'These are the marks of his battles, his permanent medals.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'Last month, the latest aerospace fighter, Fenrir, was transported to the spaceport.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Cyril will lead his team to train the new recruits from now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'During the training...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory48.jpg'}
{3: 'A massive tremor strikes the conference room and alarms blare immediately.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'Administrator, report the situation!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The channel goes silent after a brief static noise. Instead, a broadcast begins.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Attention all spaceport staff, the flagship "Miracle" has departed. Navigators, take your positions...'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Attention all spaceport staff, the frigate "Ambition" has departed. Navigators, take your positions...'}
{3: 'The continuous announcements state that all 30 starships, including the flagship, are leaving the port.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'How is that possible? I never gave an order to start the engines!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'My control permissions have been revoked!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Shin tries to contact one of the subordinates still on the flagship, but a cold automated message tells him that he can't connect."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory108.png', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Worker', 3: 'Hello, can you hear me?', 4: '12'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'I am Shin, a command officer from the Starship Fleet. Get the administrator to report the situation immediately!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "The administrator... has already perished... He was at the docking port when the starship's cold fusion engine started...", 4: '12'}
{3: 'The worker paused.'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: '...My condolences.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'I will now report the situation.', 4: '12'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'Just now, the engines of 30 starships, including the flagship, suddenly started at the port.', 4: '12'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: '320 staff members performing routine maintenance at the port died instantly. The reinforcement locks were severely damaged, and the gravitational field was imbalanced.', 4: '12'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'We attempted to contact the personnel left on the starships but received no response.', 4: '12'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: "Additionally, our communications with the ground are cut off. We've already sent someone to the ground headquarters to establish contact.", 4: '12'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Where are the starships headed?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: '...Eden II. They are heading straight for Eden II and accelerating. Collision is expected in ten minutes!', 4: '12'}
{3: "The conference room falls silent. The commandants, who are most familiar with the starships, know that the spaceport's defensive firepower is not enough to stop the starships."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "I'll lead a team to intercept them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: "It won't be enough.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Shin already considered Cyril's flight squadron, but Fenrir is not designed to fight starships of this size."}
{3: "Even if they depart now, by the time they're done preparing, the starships would have finished their acceleration phase, making it difficult for Fenrir to catch up."}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Is there any other way...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Worker', 3: 'Wait, the "Ambition" seems to have stopped accelerating... so has the "Starlight"!', 4: '12'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'Are you certain?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'Workers on the starships must be doing something!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'However, before he can inquire further, a noise from the terminal interrupts him.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Stop it. This is our last chance.', 3: '70', 4: 'cc0000'}
{3: 'Stop it. This is our last chance.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory48.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: 'The glimmer of hope in his heart dies again. As more messages come in, more starships have stopped accelerating.'}
{3: 'Each short message is a final farewell.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Make it stop.'}
{1: "We'll leave the rest to you.", 3: '70', 4: 'cc0000'}
{3: "We'll leave the rest to you."}
{1: 'We will not be the sinners of humanity.', 3: '70', 4: 'cc0000'}
{3: 'We will not be the sinners of humanity.'}
{3: 'See you around.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory48.jpg'}
{3: "Finally, Shin's terminal also begins ringing. He knows it will be a final message."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: "There's no escape. I'm the last survivor, so... don't hold back.", 3: '60', 4: 'cc0000'}
{3: "There's no escape. I'm the last survivor, so... don't hold back."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory48.jpg'}
{3: 'No one will know of their battle and no one can bid them farewell.'}
{3: 'Those on the starships are making the same choice because they all share the same value.'}
{3: 'Those brave souls who are already gone did everything they could. Now it is their turn.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'Everyone, gather in the central hall!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory583.jpg'}
{1: 'Central Hall of the Spaceport'}
{3: 'Almost everyone from the spaceport and Starship Fleet command system is gathered here.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'Is ground communication still down?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Communicator', 3: 'Still down. Both general and encrypted channels are being jammed by an unknown signal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Communicator', 3: "I will try adjusting the frequencies to connect with them, but don't get your hopes up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'What about the liaison officers we sent out?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: "They will take about an hour... We don't have Construct pilots, so we can't travel at extreme speeds.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "What's the status of the starships?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Navigation Station', 3: 'They will collide with Eden II in half an hour. The debris is enough to destroy the lunar base.'}

{2: 'Navigation Station', 3: "The chain reaction will send meteors equivalent to 30% of the moon's mass crashing onto Earth, destroying all our ground facilities. Even underground bunkers might not survive."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'We need more time...', 4: '1'}
{3: "An obvious fact lies before them: the starships will crash into humanity's last stronghold before ground rescue arrives."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'Is this the only way...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Yes... We will have to destroy the starships ourselves.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: 'But... but...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'While the temporary spaceport administrator looks surprised, the commanders of the starships seem to have expected this.'}
{3: 'They are soldiers of the old era and were already prepared for the worst when the starships first went rogue.'}
{3: 'Any uncontrollable weapon can only bring disaster, so the only option is to destroy it.'}
{2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: "But even if we want to destroy them, we don't have enough firepower.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "We don't need powerful weapons. The starship's engine uses fusion reactors.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'If we use enough explosives to disrupt the reactor, it will turn into a hydrogen bomb.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Even though the engines are running at low power, an explosion from inside will be enough to split the starship in half.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: "But we can't get into the engine room...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant B', 3: "Isn't there another entrance?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He points at the nozzle spewing out flames.'}
{2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'You want to send explosives in from here, right?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant A', 3: "The spaceport should have enough reserve, but how will you deal with the high temperatures? Missile casings can't withstand that.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "The spaceport's escape pods were designed for extreme environments. They can make it through.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: 'Wait, let me get this straight... Based on what you just said, that means...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "We need someone to pilot escape pods loaded with explosives into the starship's nozzle... That's the gist of it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He speaks calmly, as if talking about another training session.'}
{2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: 'But the engine is still running!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant A', 3: "If it isn't, we wouldn't be doing this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'Fortunately, the bomb only takes a moment to detonate.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: 'So... who will go?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This is a suicide mission, a moth to the flame.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: "I'll lead the team.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Soon, someone else volunteers for the one-way trip.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "In terms of flight experience, we're the most qualified.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Thank you for stepping up, but your future is still in the skies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "We'll take this mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yet another person rises to the grim task.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'We spent half our lives dealing with starships. No one knows them better than us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commandant B', 3: "Others have already stepped forward. We can't hide behind you.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: "You've all heard it. The decision has been made.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "They're right. We spent half our lives on starships. No one knows them better than us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'If the starships are destroyed, our experience will also become useless.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He looks at the colossal structures that have turned from defensive weapons into threats.'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "But you're different. Even if the starships perish, humanity won't leave the skies.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'We need to leave hope and a future for the next generation, not a bunch of old dudes giving orders.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'The future belongs to the young who are still getting stronger. Cyril, you are their protector.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'So... we will wait for you on the other side.', 4: '1'}
{3: "He pats Cyril's shoulder and stands before his subordinates once more."}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Flagship "Miracle", command crew, step forward!', 4: '1'}
{3: '—They face death without fear, ready to send themselves and the Miracle off for the last time.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'Escort ship "Ambition", command crew, step forward!', 4: '1'}
{3: '—Their ambition is about to be extinguished, yet they are undaunted.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant B', 3: 'Starlight...', 4: '1'}
{3: '—The stars they wished upon are about to fall, but they are not afraid.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant C', 3: 'Voyager...', 4: '1'}
{3: '—Because they will always believe...'}
{3: '—The stars will rise again, ambition will be reignited, humanity will set sail once more, and their miracles will be engraved in the cosmos.'}
{3: '300 command crew members are about to light up the darkness before dawn with their lives.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory100.png'}
{3: 'The pods, loaded with high explosives, gradually detach from the spaceport, and the indestructible Great Wall begins to crumble.'}
{2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: "Commandant, I've activated the EMP defense barrier as you instructed. The spaceport's self-defense units are on standby to intercept debris falling toward Earth."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: "Once it's safe, follow the subsequent plan to adjust your position and merge with Eden II.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Only the mass of that colony ship can help you recalibrate the gravitational field.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: 'Roger that!'}
{2: 'Temporary Administrator', 3: 'And... good luck.'}
{3: 'After communication in the headset ceases, only monotonous noises in the cockpit remain.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'Is everything set?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Yes, they will complete the mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'Who did you leave your final message to?', 4: '2'}
{3: "In the final moments of their lives, they talk about things they'd always kept in their hearts but never had time to address."}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: "I have nothing much to say, only that I'm going to join them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: "They always complained I didn't spend enough time with them. I'll have to apologize properly once I see them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "They'll be proud of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'Who knows. They might even complain I get there too early...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: "We're almost there.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4101_14.jpg'}
{3: 'The massive starships are already in sight. In comparison, the 300 escape pods look as small as moths.'}
{2: 'Commandant C', 3: "Honestly, I'm a bit scared."}
{2: 'Commandant B', 3: "Why did you have to say it... It's your fault my hands are starting to shake!"}
{2: 'Commandant C', 3: "Can the 300 of us really complete this mission? My display shows the starship's defense array is still active."}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "Stay focused. That's why we assigned ten people to each starship."}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Disperse immediately after entering the attack range to avoid being wiped out.'}
{2: 'Commandant A', 3: 'We only need one person to get through.'}
{2: 'Commandant C', 3: 'It sure feels lonely... to have no backup support...'}
{2: '???', 3: "You don't need to worry about the defenses."}
{3: 'A raspy voice suddenly breaks into the communication channel.'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Cyril?'}
{2: 'A Youthful Voice', 3: "It's not just him."}
{3: 'Suddenly, dozens of green blips appear on the radar, indicating friendly units.'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "Cyril, didn't I tell you to stay at the spaceport?!"}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Shin, don't underestimate the determination and stubbornness of the young."}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'You are always trying to protect them, but did you know they can already shoulder responsibilities?'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'No one can run from this battle. We all have a role to play.'}
{2: 'Ivor', 3: 'First Air Squadron, Ivor, reporting in.'}
{2: 'Kenley', 3: "Islay Phase Three Trainee, Kenley. We'll intercept those defense drones."}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Third Carrier Battle Group Pilot, Sofia. Please focus on your mission and leave the rest to us.'}
{2: 'William', 3: 'Second Special Operations Brigade, William...'}
{3: 'One report after another fills the communication channel, and for a moment, the lonely space is no longer silent.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Since humans first discovered fire, we've continued our journey with wisdom and courage."}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: '250,000 years ago, we conquered beasts and climbed to the top of the food chain.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Thousands of years ago, we conquered the land and let civilization take root across the planet.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'In just two hundred years, we conquered the sea and the sky.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'And now, those creations of ours want to stop our progress?'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'As the chief instructor of Project Fenrir, my order is...'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Open fire and cover the suicide squad with everything you've got!"}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "Let's show them with our guns and ammo who their true commanders are!"}

{2: 'Shin', 3: 'All units, at full speed!'}

{3: "Seize victory, even if it's a tragic one."}
